page.title: 12LEISURE/RECREATION,MADDERTY
page.content: In this country area we have lots of country sports such as, shooting pheasants,partridges,hare,rabbits and pigeons. There is clay-pigeon shooting as well. Some people go fishing or riding. Also some farmers go curling. One or two people canoe on the Pow Water. A few people are keen on bird watching. We know of one rally-driver. In winter some people go ski-ing in the hills. Indoors they do some of these things:_watch TV,listen to the radio,knitting,sewing,reading,stamp_ collecting, carving on wood or horn. In summer we do different things like swimming,gardening,golfing,cycling, jogging and going for walks and picnics. Barbecues in the garden on warm evenings are popular. So is sunbathing,if the weather is good.
